product.description: This product is an AI-driven MMP designed to transform customer data into powerful insights. It enables users to track their top-performing distribution channels with granular detail, down to every click, download, and onboard.

features.name: AI-Driven Insights
features.description: Leverages artificial intelligence to generate powerful insights from customer data.

features.name: Distribution Channel Tracking
features.description: Provides detailed tracking of top-performing distribution channels.

features.name: Granular Event Monitoring
features.description: Monitors customer interactions down to the click, download, and onboard levels.

product.targeted_market: Businesses and marketing teams looking to understand and optimize their customer acquisition and distribution strategies, particularly those with significant online presence and a need for data-driven decision-making.
product.problem_product_is_solving: The product addresses the challenge of understanding the effectiveness of various distribution channels, making it difficult to allocate marketing budgets efficiently. It solves the problem of converting raw customer data into actionable insights to improve customer acquisition and identify high-performing channels.
